generator.group: Centenary Institute of Cancer Medicine and Cell Biology

publications.title: Generation of an induced pluripotent stem cell line from a patient with conduction disease and recurrent ventricular fibrillation with a sodium voltage-gated channel alpha subunit 5 (SCN5A) gene c.392 + 3A > G splice-site variant

donor.disease_description: A conduction block of the left branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a generalized disturbance of QRS morphology on EKG.
Forms of cardiomyopathy that are not related to known coronary artery disease.

genomic_modifications.description: A conduction block of the left branch of the bundle of His. This manifests as a generalized disturbance of QRS morphology on EKG.
Forms of cardiomyopathy that are not related to known coronary artery disease.

ethics.institutional_HREC: Sydney Local Health District Ethics Review Committee
